source_section: Manual flow: notice search and opening dossier
requirement_text: App must support searching notices and opening dossier-level details.
interpretation_notes: Derived from manual title and known ESJN workflow. Exact section/page must be confirmed.

requirement_text: App must support document retrieval from dossier with clear error states and retries.
interpretation_notes: Current app already has downloader; legal/process constraints must be validated against manual sections.

requirement_text: Actions requiring authenticated role must be gated and logged.
interpretation_notes: Do not assume permissions from automation alone; map exact permission model from manual.

requirement_text: Document builder must enforce required fields before generating final submission pack.
interpretation_notes: Field-level obligations must be traced to source pages and template mapping.

requirement_text: App must produce a dossier workspace with deterministic file naming and completeness checks.
interpretation_notes: Map each required attachment type from manual to checklist item.

requirement_text: App must capture and persist submission evidence metadata for audit traceability.
interpretation_notes: Source section/page and exact evidence artifacts must be confirmed.

requirement_text: App must distinguish ePazar-specific process from ESJN tender flow in UX and validation logic.
interpretation_notes: Manual is high-risk stale; verify if process still active/current.

requirement_text: For ePazar, app must validate mandatory input set before action execution.
interpretation_notes: Mandatory set must be extracted with exact references from manual pages.

requirement_text: App must provide corrective guidance for failed steps and keep retry-safe state.
interpretation_notes: Current retry logic exists for search/download; extend to doc-handling operations.
